testcase.name: Negative login test

failure.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of Proxy element for: DefaultElementLocator 'By.xpath: (//*[text()='Authentication information not correct.']' (tried for 10 second(s) with 500 milliseconds interval)

testcase.failure:
